definition: generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton

sentences.english: Natural survival rate of eggs and the various instar larvae in different years were also investigated.
sentences.chinese: 並觀察了不同年份棉鈴蟲卵和各齡幼蟲的自然存活率。

sentences.english: It invaded H. armigera larvae and could be transmitted vertically to their offspring.
sentences.chinese: 它對棉鈴蟲有較強的致病力並可經卵垂直傳播。

sentences.english: Cotton bollworm , Helicoverpa armigera (Hubner) outbreaks in Jiangxi almost every year since 1993.
sentences.chinese: 近幾年來江西棉鈴蟲幾乎年年大發生。

sentences.english: Summer diapause in cotton bollworm, Helicoverpa armigera(Hübner), is prolongation of the pupal stage, particularly in males, initiated by high temperature.
sentences.chinese: 在預蛹期，高溫處理能誘導棉鈴蟲蛹進入夏滯育。

sentences.english: I don't much care for Uwe Boll movies .
sentences.chinese: 我很在意不烏韋棉鈴電影。

sentences.english: The two-wave-lamp can be used in the forecast of cotton bollworm.
sentences.chinese: 可以將之用於棉鈴蟲的預測預報。

sentences.english: The preliminary results of using Trichogramma to control Heliothis armigera had been reported.
sentences.chinese: 報道了利用赤眼蜂防治棉鈴蟲的初試結果。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 studied the extraction of complete DNA from H. armigera(Hübner).
sentences.chinese: 第三章爲棉鈴蟲基因組DNA的提取。

sentences.english: The resistance of cotton bolls was closely associated with their development stages.
sentences.chinese: 棉鈴的抗病性與其發育階段和環境條件密切相關。

sentences.english: These results provide basis for the forecasting of Helicoverpa armigera.
sentences.chinese: 這爲棉鈴蟲預測預報提供了依據。
